sentences.english: I heard that the appeal was heard in private.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說這件上訴案沒有公開審理。

sentences.english: At the trial, all witnesses are required to attend the court.
sentences.chinese: 在審理過程中，所有證人都應到庭。

sentences.english: The judge heard the case in chamber.
They are an appropriate venue for trying detainees for violations of the laws of war.
sentences.chinese: 軍事委員會是審理觸犯戰爭法的在押人員的合適場所。

sentences.english: This court will adjourn until tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 本法庭暫時休庭，明日繼續審理。

sentences.english: Venue - Authority of a court to hear a matter based on geographical location.
sentences.chinese: 法院審理案件的權力依據地理位置所做的劃分。

sentences.english: The plaintiff proposes that this action be tried at Brampton.
sentences.chinese: 原告建議該案件在布蘭普登審理。

sentences.english: However, law agents' consulting of case materials may not affect the hearing of cases.
sentences.chinese: 但是，訴訟代理人查閱案件材料不得影響案件的審理。

sentences.english: Article 26 The collegial system shall be applied in the trial of compensation cases.
sentences.chinese: 第二十六條審理賠償案件實行合議制。

sentences.english: Hearing limitation is the statutory period which should be obeyed by courts when hearing a case.
sentences.chinese: 審限，是人民法院審理案件必須遵守的法定期限。

sentences.english: When the judge realized the truth and agreed to re-hear the case.
sentences.chinese: 當法官意識到真相後，同意重新審理此案。

sentences.english: The three arbitrators so appointed will from an arbitration tribunal to hear the case.
sentences.chinese: 由這樣指定的三位仲裁員組成仲裁庭來審理案件。

sentences.english: The people's court shall form a new collegial panel for the purpose of the retrial.
sentences.chinese: 人民法院審理再審案件，應當另行組成合議庭。

sentences.english: The Court of Appeal hears civil and criminal appeals from the Court of First Instance and the District Court.
sentences.chinese: 訟法庭無論審理民事或刑事案件，裁判權均無限制。

sentences.english: Whether the witness appears to testify is of great influence to the trial.
sentences.chinese: 是否出咶作證對於案件的審理有很大影響。
